text: Marco Terán (born 24 September 1950) is an Ecuadorian wrestler. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Ecuador Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:People from Manabí Province
title: Marco Terán
